.. _`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Radio.__default__`:

=====
Radio
=====

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========

A ``Radio`` can be set in 2 states: ``checked`` or ``unchecked``. It has one more property
in addition to those defined in :ref:`form_control_common_props`:

+------------------+--------------+--------------+---------------------------------------------+
| Property         | Type         | Default      | Use                                         |
+==================+==============+==============+=============================================+
| checked          | bool         | -            | Display the Radio as checked                |
+------------------+--------------+--------------+---------------------------------------------+
